EmailTemplate.name: Network Partner Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Do Not Reply : Case Closed :{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Closed
Dear Customer,
Your Case No {!Case.CaseNumber} is in Closed status.
Please direct any new requests or inquiries by emailing:
Network Partners Query Management and Support team at businesspartner@auspost.com.au
Kind regards, Network Partners Query Management and Support team {!Case.Thread_Id}
